item.title: Teams Call Quality Real Time Alerting for Premium and MTR Pro Licenses
item.author: David Ponce de Leon
item.description: Overview A few things have changed since I wrote on Teams rules to monitor for offline devices. Reference Article In response to the growing importance of real-time call quality monitoring, a set of new rules have been added: Audio quality for in-progress meetings Video quality for in-progress meetings Screen sharing quality for in-progress meetings This service is limited to accounts assigned with a premium license or MTR Pro License, a restriction that presents a challenge for many organizations.
